function.name: webHookConfigurationNew
function.description: A description of a called function.

param.name: webHookId
param.description: WebHook Id. Must be unique across the whole of teamcity. Suggestion: use a name like 'ProjectIdentifier_WebHook_01'

param.name: url
param.description: WebHook URL. The URL to which the webhook will be POST'd.

param.name: template
param.description: The templateId referring to the template this webhook will use.

param.name: allProjectBuildsEnabled
param.description: A flag to instruct the webhook to run against all builds in this project. If only selected builds are required, set this to false and add a

param.name: subProjectBuildsEnabled
param.description: A flag to instruct the webhook to run against all builds sub-projects of this project. If only selected builds are required, set this to false and add a

param.name: buildType
param.description: Build Type references for which this webhook should run.
